a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Labor force participation rates for women ages 15-24, 2020 vs. 1980
Shown is the labor force participation rate for women in 2020 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis). The
female labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population ages 15-24 that is
economically active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and
Labor force participation rate for ages 15-24, female in 2020
Labor force participation rate for ages 15-24, female in 1980
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
